dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Morphology
dataObjects.description: Dorsal spines (total): 0; Dorsal soft rays (total): 7 - 8;  Analspines: 0; Analsoft rays: 5 - 6

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Size
dataObjects.title: Max. size
dataObjects.references: Baensch, H.A. and R. Riehl 1997 Aquarien Atlas, Band 5. Mergus Verlag, Melle, Germany. 1148 p. (Ref. 13614)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#DiagnosticDescription
dataObjects.description: Body elongate, head rather depressed, tail compressed.  Four pairs of barbels present; 3 on upper jaw and another on anterior nostril.  No spine below eye.  Scales rather large.  No lateral line.  A black longitudinal band on body of male.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Habitat
dataObjects.title: Environment
dataObjects.description: demersal; freshwater; pH range: 6.8 - 7.5; dH range: 8 - 18
